#Linear Regression Analysis


##### *Data Overview*
```{r , echo=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)

daie_ca4_game_data <- read_csv("amalgamated_game_survey_250_2022.csv")

#View(daie_ca4_game_data)
head(daie_ca4_game_data,5)
tail(daie_ca4_game_data,5)
summary(daie_ca4_game_data)
```


```{r , echo=FALSE}
##install.packages("ggplot2")

qqnorm(daie_ca4_game_data$avg_monthly_expenditure_dlc,
       pch = 2, frame = FALSE)


library(ggplot2)

hist(daie_ca4_game_data$age )
hist(daie_ca4_game_data$avg_monthly_expenditure_dlc  )  

plot(age ~ avg_monthly_expenditure_dlc, data = daie_ca4_game_data)

data.graph<-ggplot(daie_ca4_game_data, aes(x=age, y=avg_monthly_expenditure_dlc  ))+
                     geom_point()
data.graph

```
